def haversine_distance(coord1: Coordinates, coord2: Coordinates) -> float:
    """
    T√≠nh kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa 2 ƒëi·ªÉm theo c√¥ng th·ª©c Haversine
    Returns: distance in kilometers
    """
    R = 6371  # Earth radius in km
    lat1_rad = math.radians(coord1.lat)
    lat2_rad = math.radians(coord2.lat)
    delta_lat = math.radians(coord2.lat - coord1.lat)
    delta_lng = math.radians(coord2.lng - coord1.lng)

def dict_to_place(data: Dict) -> Place:
    coords = Coordinates(lat=data['coordinates']['lat'],
                         lng=data['coordinates']['lng'])
    return Place(
        id=data['id'],
        name=data['name'],
        poi_type=data['poi_type'],
        coordinates=coords,
        district=data['district'],
        visit_duration_minutes=data.get('visit_duration_minutes', 60),

def print_itinerary(result: Dict):
    meta = result['meta']
    route = result['route_analysis']
    print("\n" + "=" * 80)
    print(f"üìã L·ªäCH TR√åNH {meta['total_days']} NG√ÄY ‚Äî {result['destination'].upper()}")
    print(f"   Tuy·∫øn: {' ‚Üí '.join(route['cluster_order'])}")
    print("=" * 80)
    for day in result['itinerary']:
        print(f"\n{'‚îÅ' * 80}")
        print(f"üìÖ NG√ÄY {day['day']}: {day['title']}  ({day['date']})")

def dict_to_place(data: Dict) -> Place:
    coords = Coordinates(lat=data['coordinates']['lat'],
                         lng=data['coordinates']['lng'])
    return Place(
        id=data['id'],
        name=data['name'],
        poi_type=data['poi_type'],
        coordinates=coords,
        district=data['district'],
        visit_duration_minutes=data.get('visit_duration_minutes', 60),

def print_itinerary(result: Dict):
    meta = result['meta']
    route = result['route_analysis']
    print("\n" + "=" * 80)
    print(f"üìã L·ªäCH TR√åNH {meta['total_days']} NG√ÄY ‚Äî {result['destination'].upper()}")
    print(f"   Tuy·∫øn: {' ‚Üí '.join(route['cluster_order'])}")
    print("=" * 80)
    for day in result['itinerary']:
        print(f"\n{'‚îÅ' * 80}")
        print(f"üìÖ NG√ÄY {day['day']}: {day['title']}  ({day['date']})")
